title: BungeeTabListPlus安装后服务器内玩家看不见另一个玩家
author: 幽冥冥
txt_content:
BungeeTabListPlus安装后服务器内玩家看不见另一个玩家
就等于都隐身了,卸载后又恢复正常
求解

replies.author: Arobcher
replies.txt_content:
Ghost灬幽冥 发表于 2016-10-7 15:03
由于新版的实在是看不懂所以我用的版本是2.4.5的
配置文件不是这些
那么你就换成新版本的把这个复制粘贴替换default即可

replies.author: Arobcher
replies.txt_content:
修改你 BTLP default 配置文件为showTo: "all"
priority: 100

type: DYNAMIC_SIZE

showHeaderFooter: true

header:
- '&cWelcome &f${viewer name}'
- '&eW&celcome &f${viewer name}'
- '&eWe&clcome &f${viewer name}'
- '&eWel&ccome &f${viewer name}'
- '&eWelc&come &f${viewer name}'
- '&eWelco&cme &f${viewer name}'
- '&eWelcom&ce &f${viewer name}'
- '&eWelcome &f${viewer name}'
- '&cW&eelcome &f${viewer name}'
- '&cWe&elcome &f${viewer name}'
- '&cWel&ecome &f${viewer name}'
- '&cWelc&eome &f${viewer name}'
- '&cWelco&eme &f${viewer name}'
- '&cWelcom&ee &f${viewer name}'
- '&cWelcome &f${viewer name}'

headerAnimationUpdateInterval: 0.2

footer:
- '&f&oPowered by BungeeTabListPlus'

footerAnimationUpdateInterval: 0.5

customPlaceholders:
  other_server_prefix: # makes players on other servers gray
    !conditional
    condition: '${viewer server} == ${player server}'
    true: '&f'
    false: '&7'

playerSets:
  global:
    filter: "true"
    hiddenPlayers: "VISIBLE" # Hidden players show up on the tab list, avoids gliches

playerSet: global

playerOrder: "playerServerFirst,serverAlphabetically,vaultGroupInfo,alphabetically"

playerComponent: {text: "${other_server_prefix}${player name}", icon: "${player skin}", ping: "${player ping}"}复制代码

replies.author: 幽冥冥
replies.txt_content:
Arobcher 发表于 2016-10-7 14:50
修改你 BTLP default 配置文件为
由于新版的实在是看不懂所以我用的版本是2.4.5的
配置文件不是这些

replies.txt_content:
Arobcher 发表于 2016-10-7 15:03
那么你就换成新版本的把这个复制粘贴替换default即可
其实在发帖后十分钟已经解决了
就是更换新版本 2.0的有问题
